text: The Thaumatichthyidae, also called the wolftrap anglers, are a family of anglerfish consisting of two genera: Lasiognathus and Thaumatichthys. Their maxillae can form a prison cell-like trap. == Genera == * Lasiognathus Regan, 1925 * Thaumatichthys Smith & Radcliffe, 1912 == Gallery == File:Thaumatichthys.JPG|Thaumatichthys pagidostomus File:Lasiognathus beebei.JPG|Lasiognathus beebei File:Lasiognathus saccostoma.JPG|Lasiognathus saccostoma File:BMC - Thaumatichthyidae- Thaumatichthys.binghami.jpg|Thaumatichthys binghami == References == # Froese, Rainer; Pauly, Daniel (eds.).
